testcase.name: Expandable Component > Basic tests > should render collapsed by default and expand when clicked
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should render expanded by default if startExpanded is true
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should collapse when clicked after being expanded
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should handle empty prompts gracefully
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should handle null prompts gracefully
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should handle undefined prompts gracefully
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should perform well with large content when expanding/collapsing
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should update when startExpanded prop is changed dynamically
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should maintain visual consistency between expanded and collapsed states
Expandable Component > Basic tests > should respond correctly to different screen sizes
Expandable Component > Storybook Stories > should render the "PreExpanded" story correctly
Expandable Component > Storybook Stories > should render custom expand and collapse prompts in the "CustomExpandCollapsePrompt" story
Expandable Component > Storybook Stories > should render the "Default" story collapsed by default
Expandable Component > Storybook Stories > should expand the "Default" story content when clicked
Expandable Component > Storybook Stories > should allow independent toggling of nested Expandable components
Expandable Component > Accessibility Tests > should render with initial collapsed state
Expandable Component > Accessibility Tests > should expand and focus on content when clicked
Expandable Component > Accessibility Tests > should collapse and move focus back to the button
Expandable Component > Accessibility Tests > should start expanded if startExpanded is true
Expandable Component > Accessibility Tests > When Expandables are nested > should set aria-expanded correctly for parent and child independently
Expandable Component > Accessibility Tests > When Expandables are nested > should manage focus correctly between parent and child expandables
Expandable Component > Accessibility Tests > When Expandables are nested > should be keyboard navigable for both parent and child
